statements: SELECT * FROM HospitalsInventory;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM HospitalsInventory WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT id, item_name, quantity, expiry_date FROM HospitalsInventory WHERE item_type = 'Medicine';
SELECT item_name, quantity, location FROM HospitalsInventory ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT * FROM HospitalsInventory WHERE quantity > 100 AND expiry_date > '2023-01-01' ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM HospitalsInventory WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY expiry_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, item_name, quantity FROM HospitalsInventory WHERE location = 'Medical Ward' ORDER BY quantity ASC, item_name DESC;
SELECT item_name, item_type, location FROM HospitalsInventory WHERE expiry_date > '2023-01-01' AND quantity < 50 ORDER BY item_type, location;
SELECT * FROM HospitalsInventory WHERE item_type LIKE '%medicine%' AND location IN ('Emergency Room', 'Pharmacy') ORDER BY id;
SELECT id, item_name, location FROM HospitalsInventory WHERE quantity > 0 GROUP BY location HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT * FROM hospitals_inventory
SELECT hospital_id, item_name, item_quantity FROM hospitals_inventory ORDER BY item_name DESC
SELECT item_name, item_category FROM hospitals_inventory WHERE hospital_id = 1001
SELECT SUM(item_quantity) FROM hospitals_inventory
SELECT drug_name, drug_quantity, expiry_date FROM pharmaceuticals_inventory WHERE expiry_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT item_name, item_quantity, item_category FROM hospitals_inventory WHERE item_quantity > 10 ORDER BY item_name DESC;
SELECT item_name, item_quantity FROM hospitals_inventory WHERE item_quantity BETWEEN 5 AND 20 AND item_category = 'Medication' ORDER BY item_quantity ASC;
SELECT hospital_id, item_name, item_quantity FROM hospitals_inventory WHERE hospital_id IN (1, 3, 5) AND item_quantity < 50 ORDER BY hospital_id ASC, item_name ASC;
SELECT drug_name, drug_quantity, expiry_date FROM pharmaceuticals_inventory WHERE expiry_date >= '2023-01-01' ORDER BY expiry_date DESC;
SELECT drug_name, drug_quantity FROM pharmaceuticals_inventory WHERE drug_quantity < 100 ORDER BY drug_quantity DESC, drug_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM hospitals;
SELECT name, location FROM hospitals WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, name, quantity FROM medical_supplies WHERE hospital_id = 2 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT name, expiration_date FROM pharmaceuticals WHERE hospital_id = 3 ORDER BY expiration_date ASC;
SELECT id, name, location FROM hospitals JOIN pharmaceuticals ON hospitals.id = pharmaceuticals.hospital_id;
SELECT * FROM hospitals ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, name, location FROM hospitals WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT name, quantity FROM medical_supplies WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT id, name, expiration_date FROM pharmaceuticals WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY expiration_date ASC;
SELECT h.name AS hospital_name, m.name AS supply_name, m.quantity FROM hospitals h JOIN medical_supplies m ON h.id = m.hospital_id WHERE m.quantity < 50;
SELECT * FROM HospitalInventory;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM HospitalInventory WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT equipment_name, location FROM Equipment ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT medicine_name, dosage FROM Pharmaceuticals WHERE quantity < 50;
SELECT supplier_name FROM Suppliers WHERE contact_number LIKE '%123%' ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM HospitalInventory ORDER BY expiry_date DESC, quantity ASC;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM HospitalInventory WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_number FROM Suppliers;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM HospitalInventory WHERE expiry_date >= '2023-01-01';
SELECT medicine_name, dosage FROM Pharmaceuticals ORDER BY medicine_name ASC, quantity DESC;
SELECT hospital_name, location, contact_number FROM Hospital;
SELECT * FROM MedicalSupply WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT equipment_name, status FROM Equipment ORDER BY status;
SELECT medicine_name, dosage, manufacturer FROM Pharmaceuticals WHERE dosage = '10mg';
SELECT hospital_name, supply_name, quantity FROM Hospital JOIN Inventory ON Hospital.hospital_id = Inventory.hospital_id JOIN MedicalSupply ON Inventory.supply_id = MedicalSupply.supply_id;
SELECT * FROM Hospital ORDER BY hospital_name DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT hospital_name, location FROM Hospital WHERE location = 'New York'
SELECT equipment_name, status FROM Equipment WHERE status = 'Available'
SELECT medicine_name, dosage, manufacturer FROM Pharmaceuticals WHERE manufacturer = 'Pfizer'
SELECT * FROM Inventory JOIN Hospital ON Hospital.hospital_id = Inventory.hospital_id JOIN MedicalSupply ON MedicalSupply.supply_id = Inventory.supply_id
